application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: W1 = (White beam) - Small Tree Felling - REAR GardenTo remove the tree to ground level, to estimated 30 centimetres, to avoid blunting saws.L1 = (Lime) - Small PollardTo restore the tree to its previous pollard points or establish new ones as needed.To reduce the tree's height by 3 meters and its spread by 2 meters.To eliminate any dead or decaying wood identified during aerial inspection.To eliminate any basal growth on the trunk.To remove nested foliage overgrown from neighbours to create a uniform tree, cutting back to boundary by 2 meters.SB1 = (Silver birch) - Small Tree FellingTo remove the tree to ground level, to estimated 30 centimetres, to avoid blunting saws.C1 = (Cherry) - Small Tree ReductionTo reduce tree by 30% in overall canopy, estimated 1.5 meters in height and 1 meters in spread.To lift lower branches to crown break, estimated 3 meters from ground level.To thin branches by 10% and dead wood significant branches.SG1 = (1 Day Rate) Tree Stump Grinding Width (...) metersTo professionally grind "all felled" tree stumps and plants below ground level to a depth of approximately 20-30cm.Access of a minimum width of 64cm is required through gates and side accesses.*Disclaimer: Wood chippings and soil generated during stump grinding will be left on-site for backfilling. Please refer to our terms and conditions for details.B1 = (2x Bay 'laurel') - Small Tree FellingTo remove the tree to ground level, to estimated 30 centimetres, to avoid blunting saws.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
